# Aman Suryavanshi - AI Workflow Architect & n8n Expert

> Full-Stack Agentic Developer specializing in self-healing n8n automation systems, Multi-LLM Orchestration (GPT-4, Claude, Gemini), and Next.js AI dashboards. Generated ₹300K+ revenue for clients through Website + AI SEO + Automation.

## About
Aman Suryavanshi is an AI Solutions Architect and Full-Stack Agentic Developer based in India. He builds production-grade n8n automation workflows with self-healing capabilities, Dead-Letter Queues, and 99.9% uptime guarantees. His expertise spans LangGraph/CrewAI multi-agent systems and Next.js AI-powered web applications.

## Services
- n8n Production Workflow Architecture (Self-healing, DLQ, 99.9% uptime)
- LangGraph/CrewAI Multi-Agent Systems Development
- Next.js AI Dashboard Development with Firebase & Sanity CMS
- Technical SEO/GEO Optimization for Developer Portfolios
- AI Content Automation (Multi-platform distribution)

## Key Projects
- /projects/aviators-training-centre: ₹300K revenue case study - n8n + Next.js flight training platform
- /projects/n8n-automation-suite: 74-node Omni-Post AI content automation workflow
- /projects/n8n-github-backup: Enterprise workflow backup with 99.9% recovery rate
- /projects/barkat-enterprise: B2B e-commerce with 3,000+ viewers
- /projects/av-newsstream: News aggregator with API key rotation
- /projects/foodah: React performance optimization (40% load time reduction)

## Tech Stack
- Automation: n8n, LangGraph, CrewAI, Zapier
- AI/LLM: OpenAI GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, LangChain
- Frontend: Next.js 14/15, React 18, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- Backend: Node.js, Express, Firebase, Supabase
- CMS: Sanity, Notion API
- DevOps: Vercel, Docker, GitHub Actions
